articles.author: Jake Traylor
articles.title: Trump: Russia and Ukraine peace requires “land swapping” - Politico
articles.description: Following the Friday summit in Alaska, Trump said he would immediately call European leaders and Zelenskyy to discuss any deal.
articles.content:
Russia has occupied a big portion of Ukraine, Trump said. Theyve occupied some very prime territory. Were going to try and get some of that territory back for Ukraine.
Friday, Trump said, is a feel … [+1196 chars]

articles.title: Europe and Ukraine leaders seek talks with Trump to defend their interests ahead of US-Russia summit - AP News
articles.description: Ukraine and its European backers are seeking talks with U.S. President Donald Trump in an effort to protect their security interests ahead of his summit with Russian President Vladimir Putin later this week. The German chancellor has invited Trump, Ukrainian …
articles.content: BRUSSELS (AP) Ukraine and its European backers on Monday sought talks with U.S. President Donald Trump in an effort to protect their security interests ahead of his summit with Russian President Vlad… [+5960 chars]
